cause.description:
Four year old Madeleine McCann was abducted in Portugal while asleep in her hotel room. Her parents have asked the world to help find her. She has blond hair, is 2-feet-11-inches tall and has one distinctive feature. Her right eye has a dark birthmark in its hazel-green iris.
1. Find Madeleine
2. Spread the word to be on the look out for her
3. Keep children from being kidnapped in the future.
cause.name: Help Find Madeleine
